POLYGON TRIANGULATION BENCHMARK (paper)
polygons_per_config=5
Algorithms:
- ours: reflex_cli
- earcut: earcut_cli (mapbox/earcut.hpp)
- garey: polypartition_mono_cli (Triangulate_MONO)
- hertel: polypartition_hm_cli (ConvexPartition_HM + triangulate pieces)
